alert.note: Alert for Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 09 at 1:00PM CDT until May 09 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ORLEANS PARISH... At 1259 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near East New Orleans, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, East New Orleans and Lakefront Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 238 and 252. Interstate 510 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 610 near mile marker 4. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
